sentences.en: Don't shake the bottle or you will disturb the lees.
sentences.cn: 别摇晃瓶子,要不沉淀就都搅起来了.

sentences.en: High solid ferments and yeast lees contract to highlight textural qualities.
sentences.cn: 采用固体发和酵母分离技术提高酒的品质.

sentences.en: I see six bees, waiting for the lees.
sentences.cn: 我看见六只蜜蜂, 排队找遮蔽处.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the anticoagulant activity of different portions of leech ethanol extracts ( LEEs ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究 水蛭 不同提取物对人血浆的抗凝活性及作用环节.

sentences.en: Portions of petroleum ether, n - butanol and water extracted from LEEs was much weaker on anticoagulant activity.
sentences.cn: 石油醚部位 、 正丁醇部位、水部位也有较弱抗凝活性.

sentences.en: Seldom have I met a girl whos had such a gift of gab like Lee Lees.
sentences.cn: 我几乎没见过像莉莉这样有口才的女孩子.

sentences.en: The lees of wine gradually subside.
The lees were stirred once a week.
sentences.cn: 大桶每周将被搅拌一次.

sentences.en: The other method was that maize oil was prepared from lees.
sentences.cn: 二是从蒸馏后的酒糟(DDGS)中用溶剂浸出提取玉米毛油,毛油经进一步精炼得精制玉米油或一级玉米油.

sentences.en: There are lees to every wine.
There are still a lot of problems in comprehensive utilization of wine lees.
sentences.cn: 黄酒糟是黄酒生产企业的主要副产物.

sentences.en: There is lees to every wine.
This paper studies the process conditions and flow of rice wine lees utilization.
sentences.cn: 研究开发利用黄酒糟的工艺条件和工艺流程.

sentences.en: Wine lees is the by - product in yellow rice wine production.
sentences.cn: 酒糟是黄酒企业生产黄酒的 副产物.

words.tran_cn: 沉淀物；残渣；庇护所（lee的复数）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 李安（著名华人导演）
n. 李光耀（新加坡政治领导人）
汤米·李·琼斯（美国著名男演员）

trans.tran_cn: （酒等中的）沉淀物，渣滓，避风处，背风处( lee的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: the sediment from an alcoholic drink
